name: South Bombay
description: Our main training center located in the heart of Mumbai's business district

testimonials.text: Perfect location in South Bombay. Easy commute from Andheri via Western Line.

name: Churchgate
description: Prime location near Churchgate station, accessible from all parts of Mumbai

testimonials.text: Churchgate location made it super convenient to attend weekend classes from Thane.

name: Marine Lines
description: Strategic location with excellent connectivity and proximity to business centers

testimonials.text: Marine Lines area is perfect for professionals working in South Mumbai.

name: Colaba
description: Easily accessible from our Churchgate center, serving students from Colaba area

testimonials.text: From Colaba, it's just a short ride to the Churchgate center. Very convenient!

name: Nariman Point
description: Mumbai's business district location, ideal for working professionals

testimonials.text: Perfect for working professionals in Nariman Point. Could easily attend after office hours.
